address: Contrada Passo di Gurra  SP 79 km 91
description: A luxurious guesthouse belonging to the famous Sicilian winery Planeta and surrounded by beautiful vineyards is the setting for this restaurant serving top-quality Sicilian cuisine. Home-grown ingredients make an appearance in some dishes, while the extensive wine list obviously features a good selection of Planeta’s own labels.
facilitiesServices: ['Car park', 'Garden or park', 'Great view', 'Interesting wine list', 'Terrace']
